camera_get_active: This function can be used to retrieve the unique camera ID value of the currently active camera.

{ANY_CODE} var active = camera_get_active();
if active != view_camera[0]
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}view_camera[0] = active;
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code gets the camera ID for the active camera and sets the view camera for port[0] to use it.
